channel.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
Don't know if anyone has made a class like this. Its also my first time trying SO DON'T YELL AT ME IF ITS OVERPOWERED OR UNDERPOWERED. just leave nice suggestions. Also I have NO idea how to organize this so LETS AGOOOO
The Framer (Neutral Killing) Passive 1:I totally didn't throw that wine out- Immune to occupation and redirection. Won't show up as immune/redirection immune. Passive 2:Wrong guy he went that way-Immune to death at night
Day ability 1:Frame- Frame someone. Makes them show up as Killer/Offensive, Shows up as Cult/Unseen when checked. Also makes them show up as Occupy/Redirection immune. If they were to be occupied, they would still be occupied. Just the drunk would think they are immune. 3 uses(Can turn it down if its to OP)
Day ability 2:I know all your secrets-Hears all whispers for the day. 1 use (To help with the whisper meta)
Night ability 1:Framed-Pick a person to kill. You will not be seen visiting this person. If the person is immune you gain a extra charge of all your day abilities.
Night ability 2:Your dead-Choose a person. They will die NO MATTER WHAT. Bypasses everything. 1 use. (You will not die to a knights guard) (Can't be used till N3)
I thought of this class as a way to distrust unseen/cult checks. The only reason I gave the class the second night ability cause I felt as if it needed a way to deal with night immunity. The second one would also make prince think twice before outing himself
Thoughts on this?

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Think people are awake any other suggestions

Read full topic

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I am pretty proud of myself for the fact that it took me like 5-10 mins just to make it.

Read full topic

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I fixed it instead of being a copy of possessor strings “Which Keep in mind this took me about 5 min to make because I CAN TYPE FAST and I thought after I posted it that it was the exact same thing” If your target is immune you gain a extra charge of both of your day abilities. Which I also added one to help with claiming to king meta.

So any extra comments will be appreciated

Also does anyone know how to make it look more organized?

Read full topic

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)

item.description:
Not that I know of.

Read full topic

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I wanted something he can use to frame people at night. Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Chocolate
item.description:
Firelitten:

Passive 2:Wrong guy he went that way-Immune to death at night

I like this.

Firelitten:

Passive 1:I totally didn’t throw that wine out- Immune to occupation and redirection. Won’t show up as immune/redirection immune.

I also like this

Firelitten:

Night ability 1:Framed-Pick two people. The first one will “Appear to have visited the second person”. The second one dies. You can select the same person you are killing. Lets say only 1 person is left. You can select them twice. Unlimited uses.

Literally a heavily nerfed version of the Possessor’s Puppet Strings ability

Firelitten:

Night ability 2:Your dead-Choose a person. They will die NO MATTER WHAT.

Bypasses everything. 1 use. (You will not die to a knights guard) (Can’t be used till N3)

It’s okay. More powerful than the Reaper’s Gather Darkness, but that’s okay. Reaper is still a stronger class overall.

Read full topic

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I think we could add something that lets them hear all whispers for 1 day as a ability. to fix the whisper me meta

Read full topic

item.title: The Framer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I think it is perfect. The 1 shot kill anything will certainly lower the amount of times prince will say “I AM PRINCE”. Cause then bam he is dead

Read full topic

item.description:
Well I personally don’t know how to balance things, I mean it seems to not be OP
